title: Bokutachi wa Benkyou ga Dekinai Short Story Collection - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted from Manga   Clever Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist
author: Hamubane   はむばね
description:
Having lost his father, Yuiga Nariyuki lives a simple and modest life. While working to attain the ‘Special VIP nomination’ for a college, he became the private tutor of the three geniuses of Ichinose Academy: Rizu, Fumino, and Uruka!

This is a short-story collection consisting of two volumes. >
